alert.note: Alert for Fallon (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 11:11PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Fallon County through MIDNIGHT MDT... At 1106 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Marmarth, or 14 miles southeast of Baker, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail and heavy rainfall, with light accumulations of small hail possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible along with ponding of water in low-lying areas and on roadways. Locations impacted include... Baker and Willard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. The main impacts will remain mostly south of Baker, MT at this time.
